directions: In a large salad bowl, gently mix together the baby greens, pecans, berries, and blue cheese. Toss with balsamic vinaigrette.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package mixed baby lettuces and spring greens
1/4 cup balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing, or to taste
title: Colleen's Jewel of a Salad
